oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many messages in a folder

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName
options.description: Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachments. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is "attachment_" the first attachment is saved to "attachment_0"

options.name: fields
options.description: Fields the response will contain. Multiple can be added separated by comma.

options.name: filter
options.description: Microsoft Graph API OData $filter query. Information about the syntax can be found here.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

replyType.name: replyType
replyType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

comment.name: comment
comment.description: A comment to include. Can be an empty string.
comment.ai_hint: A comment to include. Can be an empty string.

send.name: send
send.description: Whether to send the reply message directly. If not set, it will be saved as draft.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

toRecipients.name: toRecipients
toRecipients.description: Email addresses of recipients. Multiple can be added separated by comma.
toRecipients.ai_hint: Email addresses of recipients. Multiple can be added separated by comma.

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

folderType.name: folderType
folderType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

includeNestedFolders.name: includeNestedFolders
includeNestedFolders.description: Whether to include child folders in the search

sourceFolderIds.name: sourceFolderIds
sourceFolderIds.description: The mailbox folders that should be mined
sourceFolderIds.ai_hint: The mailbox folders that should be mined

filterQuery.name: filterQuery
filterQuery.description: The OData query to filter the messages
filterQuery.ai_hint: The OData query to filter the messages

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: categories
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

values.name: value
values.description: Value to set for the header

options.name: from
options.description: The owner of the mailbox which the message is sent. Must correspond to the actual mailbox used.

options.name: isRead
options.description: Whether the message has been read

options.name: isReadReceiptRequested
options.description: Whether a read receipt is requested for the message

options.name: toRecipients
options.description: Email addresses of recipients. Multiple can be added separated by comma.

options.name: replyTo
options.description: Email addresses to use when replying

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'draft' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation IN ["delete", "get", "send", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'subject'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'bodyContent'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation IN ["addAttachment", "delete", "get", "getAttachment", "getMime", "move", "update", "reply"] THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'reply' THEN SHOW parameter 'replyType'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'reply' THEN SHOW parameter 'comment'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'reply' THEN SHOW parameter 'send'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'reply' AND replyType == 'reply' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation IN ["create", "send"] THEN SHOW parameter 'subject'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation IN ["create", "send"] THEN SHOW parameter 'bodyContent'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'toRecipients'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getMime' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'move' THEN SHOW parameter 'folderId'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation IN ["add", "download", "get", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation IN ["download", "get"] THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentId'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation IN ["add", "download"] THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation IN ["get", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation IN ["delete", "get", "getChildren", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'folderId'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation IN ["getAll", "getChildren"] THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation IN ["getAll", "getChildren"] AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'folderType'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'displayName'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'create' AND folderType == 'searchFolder' THEN SHOW parameter 'includeNestedFolders'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'create' AND folderType == 'searchFolder' THEN SHOW parameter 'sourceFolderIds'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'create' AND folderType == 'searchFolder' THEN SHOW parameter 'filterQuery'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation IN ["get", "getAll", "getChildren"] THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'folderMessage' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'folderMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'folderId'
IF resource == 'folderMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'folderMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'folderMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource IN ["draft", "message"] AND operation IN ["get", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource IN ["draft", "message"] AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
